sentences.en: At the same time, a provident fund interest rate also reached its lowest level in history.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 公积金利率也达到历史最低水平.

sentences.en: Can jointly apply for the purchase of second - hand housing provident fund loans?
sentences.cn: 购买二手房可否共同申请公积金贷款?

sentences.en: Careful in regard to one's own interests; provident.
sentences.cn: 在自己的利益方面小心仔细的; 节俭的.

sentences.en: Friends Provident International and the Corporate Rose Logo are registered trade marks of Friends Provident Companies.
sentences.cn: 英国友诚国际有限公司及其公司的玫瑰标志都是英国友诚的注册商标.

sentences.en: Good harvests make men prodigal, Bad ones provident.
sentences.cn: 丰年挥霍浪费, 歉年勤俭节约.

sentences.en: He is provident of his money.
How to apply for loans by the lending bank provident fund information?
sentences.cn: 贷款银行如何审核公积金贷款申请资料?

sentences.en: In addition, the housing provident fund roncador no annual fee and small account management fees.
sentences.cn: 另外, 住房公积金龙卡也不收取年费和小额帐户管理费.

sentences.en: In his usual provident manner, he had insured himself against this type of loss.
sentences.cn: 在他一贯的公积金的方式, 他本人对保险这种类型的损失.

sentences.en: One - year loan has been paid Provident Fund is still in the original interest rate.
sentences.cn: 一年期已发放公积金贷款仍执行原利率.

sentences.en: Provident men lay aside money for their families.
sentences.cn: 深谋远虑的人为家庭贮蓄钱财.

sentences.en: The second is in the hall to the provident fund management - and the borrower issuing questionnaires.
sentences.cn: 二是在各管理处大厅向公积金经办人和借款人发放问卷.
他们是有远见的政治家.
野生松鼠很会为将来做打算.

sentences.en: You are a provident person, I see.
sentences.cn: 我看你这个人倒很有深谋远虑呀.

words.tran_cn: 节俭的；有先见之明的；顾及未来的

phrases.tran_cn: 公积金；福利基金；准备基金

trans.tran_en: careful and sensible in the way you plan things, especially by saving money for the future
